casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Clyde CHAVERS, Defendant-Appellant. No. 30998

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Aug. 11, 1971. *859John L. Scott, Jr., Amarillo, Tex. (court appointed), for defendant-appellant. Eldon B. Mahon, U. S. Atty., W. E. Smith, William L. Johnson, Jr., Asst. U. S. Attys., Fort Worth, Tex., for plaintiff-appellee.

Before JOHN R. BROWN, Chief Judge, and INGRAHAM and RONEY, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See N.L.R.B. v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5th Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
